dict.acceptation: 教学；教义；所教的东西；学说；
教( teach的现在分词)；教书；训练；教育；

sent.orig: In fact, effective teaching depends on ideal teaching materials, scientific teaching model and flexible teaching techniques.
sent.trans: 事实证明，有效的教学取决于理想的教材、科学的教学模式和灵活的教学技巧。

sent.orig: Case teaching is a kind of teaching method that effectively integrates theoretical teaching and practical teaching.
sent.trans: 案例教学是一种有效结合理论教学与实践教学的教学方法，是现代高校教育中不可缺少的教学方法。

sent.orig: Reflections are advanced on Agro-ecology from teaching contents, teaching means and teaching methods.
sent.trans: 本文就《农业生态学》教学内容、教学手段、教学方法等三方面进行了探索性思考。

sent.orig: The long-distance teaching system is one new teaching method, causes the teaching and the network unifies.
sent.trans: 远程教学系统是一种新型的教学方法，使教学和网络相结合。

sent.orig: Teaching reconsidering is the geography effective teaching instruction essential important link, after class teaching reconsidering primarily.
sent.trans: 教学反思则是地理有效课堂教学必不可少的重要环节，以课后教学反思为主。
